ygData.subject: Re: New Spells Apparently Being Implemented
ygData.msgSnippet: THANK YOU!!!...all I can say cause I play a human SK, which is pretty rare on my server (SOL RO) and it is hell but I keep at it. Darc Stormreaver Sol Ro In a
ygData.messageBody:
THANK YOU!!!...all I can say 'cause I play a human SK, which is pretty rare
on my server (SOL RO) and it is hell but I keep at it.

Darc Stormreaver
Sol Ro

In a message dated 9/15/99 4:25:41 PM Eastern Daylight Time, bhook@...
writes:

<< From: "Brian Hook" <bhook@...>

I spoke with our magic system designer and he does not believe those spells
(Infectious cloud, Spirit Armor, and Augment Death) are
supposed to be for Shadow Knights and thus might be a data entry error.
He's double checking these.

I'm also talking to him about possibly changing some other aspects of SKs to
make them more viable in the low/mid-levels.

One problem that SKs face -- and one of the reasons that they are so
difficult to play -- is that they were tuned on the assumption
that you would be playing an Ogre or Troll. As such, human SKs are quite
possibly the second most difficult class/race combination
in the game to play (after Erudite Paladin).

Brian

>>
